0.text: Innate: Scoring a champion  takedown within 3 seconds of damaging them  reduces the current cooldowns of Katarina's abilities by 15 seconds.
0.html: Innate: Scoring a champion takedown within 3 seconds of damaging them  reduces the current cooldowns of Katarina's abilities by 15 seconds.

1.text: Innate - Sinister Steel: Whenever Katarina retrieves a Dagger, she uses it to slash around herself, dealing 68 − 240 (based on level) (+ 60% bonus AD) (+ 65 / 75 / 85 / 95% (based on level) AP) magic damage to nearby enemies and applying  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness to enemy  champions hit, as well as  reducing  Shunpo's total cooldown by 78 / 84 / 90 / 96% (based on level).
1.html: Innate - Sinister Steel: Whenever Katarina retrieves a Dagger, she uses it to slash around herself, dealing 68 − 240 (based on level) (+ 60% bonus AD) (+ 65 / 75 / 85 / 95% (based on level) AP) magic damage to nearby enemies and applying on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness to enemy champions hit, as well as  reducing Shunpo's total cooldown by 78 / 84 / 90 / 96% (based on level).

2.text: Daggers will disappear after being on the ground for 4 seconds, granting  sight of their radius.
2.html: Daggers will disappear after being on the ground for 4 seconds, granting sight of their radius.

0.text: Active: Katarina throws a Dagger at the target enemy that can bounce to up to two additional nearby enemies, dealing magic damage.
0.html: Active: Katarina throws a Dagger at the target enemy that can bounce to up to two additional nearby enemies, dealing magic damage.

1.text: The Dagger then lands onto the ground after 1 second, roughly 350 units opposite from where it struck the first target.
1.html: The Dagger then lands onto the ground after 1 second, roughly 350 units opposite from where it struck the first target.

2.text: The target does not have to be  visible for the Dagger to bounce to them.
2.html: The target does not have to be visible for the Dagger to bounce to them.

0.text: Active: Katarina tosses a Dagger into the air above her current location and gains  bonus movement speed that decays until it lands after 1.25 seconds, becoming  ghosted for the same duration.
0.html: Active: Katarina tosses a Dagger into the air above her current location and gains  bonus movement speed that decays until it lands after 1.25 seconds, becoming ghosted for the same duration.

0.text: Active: Katarina  blinks to the target location around the target unit or Dagger, dealing magic damage to the nearest enemy in range and applying  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.
0.html: Active: Katarina blinks to the target location around the target unit or Dagger, dealing magic damage to the nearest enemy in range and applying on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.

1.text: Shunpo  resets Katarina's basic attack timer. Upon blinking, Katarina enters a 0.15-second cast time.
1.html: Shunpo resets Katarina's basic attack timer. Upon blinking, Katarina enters a 0.15-second cast time.

0.text: Active: Katarina  channels for up to 2.5 seconds, rapidly throwing a dagger every 0.166 seconds to up to 3 of the closest nearby enemy champions,  revealing herself in the process.Each dagger deals physical damage and magic damage, applies on-attack and  on-hit (without applying  life steal) effects, and inflicts 40%  Grievous Wounds on the target for 3 seconds.
0.html:
Active: Katarina channels for up to 2.5 seconds, rapidly throwing a dagger every 0.166 seconds to up to 3 of the closest nearby enemy champions, revealing herself in the process.

Each dagger deals physical damage and magic damage, applies on-attack and on-hit (without applying  life steal) effects, and inflicts 40% Grievous Wounds on the target for 3 seconds.

0.content: 18% (+ 30% per 100% bonus attack speed) bonus AD

1.content: 270% (+ 450.009% per 100% bonus attack speed) bonus AD

1.text: An enemy champion within  500 units is required to cast this ability. The target does not have to be  visible to be hit by this ability.
1.html: An enemy champion within 500 units is required to cast this ability. The target does not have to be visible to be hit by this ability.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Glory: Gain 2 stacks for each champion kill and 1 stack for each assist, up to a maximum of 10 stacks. Lose 5 stacks on death. Stacks are preserved when upgrading to Mejai's Soulstealer.
Unique – Dread: Gain 4 ability power for each stack of Glory.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – GLORY: Gain 2 stacks for each champion kill and 1 stack for each assist, up to a maximum of 10 stacks. Lose 5 stacks on death. Stacks are preserved when upgrading to  Mejai's Soulstealer.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Supersonic: Dash 125 to 275 units in the target direction, though not through terrain, unleashing an arc of 7 rockets in the same direction that deal 125 (+ 15% AP) magic damage. Afterwards, gain 30% bonus movement speed while moving towards nearby enemy champions for 1.5 seconds (40 second cooldown).
Supersonic resets the user's basic attack timer.
active.originText:
UNIQUE – SUPERSONIC:  Dash 125 to 275 units in the target direction, though not through terrain, unleashing an arc of 7 rockets in the same direction that deal 125 (+ 15% AP) magic damage. Afterwards, gain 30% bonus movement speed while moving towards nearby enemy champions for 1.5 seconds (40 second cooldown).
Supersonic resets the user's basic attack timer.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 magic penetration.
